description: Whether a patient is self-regulating their anticoagulation therapy dosage.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: AC_IS_SELF_REG_YN
columns.description:
Used to indicate whether a patient is self-regulating their vitimin-K based anticoagulation medication dosage.


May contain organization-specific values: No
